mapper.select:
select ec.id, ec.title, ec.price, ec.lesson_num lessonNum, et.name teacherName, ec.cover, es.title subjectLevelOne, es2.title subjectLevelTwo from edu_course ec left join edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id left join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id left join edu_subject es on es.id = ec.subject_parent_id left join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_id = es2.id
where ec.id = #{courseId}
